originalText.text: By far, the best pediatricians and nurses hands down! Great customer service! Clean facilities! Helpful nurses! and Knowledgeable doctors. Dr. Jane Rosini and Nurse Yvette are so helpful and they make you feel comfortable as first time parents. Never was a question too silly nor was there any request too unreasonable. They make your child feel welcomed and at ease. I am thrilled to have such a great pediatric team!

text.text: By far, the best pediatricians and nurses hands down! Great customer service! Clean facilities! Helpful nurses! and Knowledgeable doctors. Dr. Jane Rosini and Nurse Yvette are so helpful and they make you feel comfortable as first time parents. Never was a question too silly nor was there any request too unreasonable. They make your child feel welcomed and at ease. I am thrilled to have such a great pediatric team!

originalText.text: I did not like the nurse that has accent. The front desk and the doctors are great!! I brought my kids here several times and the nurse tune of voice I did not like at all still. She sounds bossy and judging. Meanwhile, the doctors are great.

text.text: I did not like the nurse that has accent. The front desk and the doctors are great!! I brought my kids here several times and the nurse tune of voice I did not like at all still. She sounds bossy and judging. Meanwhile, the doctors are great.

originalText.text: Very nice office. I didn't wait more than 5 minutes at every step of the process: check-in, nurse, doctor, check-out. Everyone was very helpful. The doctor (Dr Kim) spent a lot of time with me and answered all my questions very specifically.  I'm very pleased with their service and will consider coming to them for my annual.

originalText.text: I like the fact that several departments are in one building. So far all the doctors and nurses we've seen are warm, they smile or are welcoming, nice. Doctors work together to assert the best treatment.

originalText.text: I liked the expediency of the staff for the clients. As of today I'm happy with their service.
